name: Jagwar Ma
description: '''Jagwar Ma''' is an Australian [[Psychedelic music|psychedelic]] [[dance music|dance]] band formed in [[Sydney]] in 2011. It consists of Gabriel Winterfield (lead vocalist, guitarist), Jono Ma (guitar, beats, synths, production), and bass guitarist Jack Freeman, who joined in 2012. The band name is derived from a satirical compound of the word "jaguar" and Jono's surname. In 2013, Jagwar Ma signed with record labels [[Mom+Pop]] (US), Marathon Artists (EU), and [[Future Classic]] (Australia) and released its debut album ''Howlin{{'}}''. It released its second album ''Every Now and Then'' on 14 October 2016.
